cab.content: This Document Is the Property of-.His Britannic fiaiasty's.GovernmenttSecret.1048- Fvortfv iceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India, hilh August 1919.. (Received 15th.)11067. 14th August. Malleson telegraphs 13th August: " Askahad refugees arriving at Persian frontier report Bolsheviks had 400 casualties in recent lighting. Previous stories about alarm in Tashkend over Cossack advance is also confirmed by refugees."
